name: NASCAR Heat 2002
description: NASCAR Heat 2002 is a NASCAR video game produced by Infogrames for the Xbox, PlayStation 2, and Game Boy Advance. It came out on June 18, 2001 for PS2 and November 15, 2001 on the Xbox. NASCAR Heat 2002 is the successor to NASCAR Heat, and the predecessor to NASCAR: Dirt to Daytona. NASCAR Heat 2002 can have 24 racers (PS2) and 43 (Xbox, including fictional cars) on track, and has 19 official NASCAR tracks.
